text: The High Cost of Health: Analyzing America's Healthcare Affordability Crisis." PayZen's latest report exposes the harsh reality of healthcare affordability in America. Patients are forced to skip or delay necessary care due to unaffordable costs, highlighting the need for innovative solutions. As a champion of limited government intervention and free-market principles, I believe that technology-driven solutions, like those offered by PayZen, can help alleviate the financial burden of healthcare and promote better patient outcomes. It's time to embrace the power of AI and modernize our healthcare system for a more sustainable future.
